name: mail-in-a-box
description: Mail-in-a-Box is an easy-to-deploy mail server solution for self-hosting. With one command, it configures DNS, SMTP, IMAP, and webmail, turning a cloud or VPS server into a working email server.
features: One-command setup: Deploy a complete mail server with DNS, SMTP, IMAP, and webmail using a single script.
Automatic DNS: Configure DNS records automatically including MX, SPF, DKIM, and DMARC for proper email delivery.
Webmail included: Access email through Roundcube webmail interface without additional configuration.
SSL certificates: Automatic Let's Encrypt SSL certificate provisioning and renewal for secure connections.
Spam filtering: Built-in spam and virus scanning to protect mailboxes from unwanted content.
Backup system: Automated daily backups of mail data with easy restoration options.
Status monitoring: Dashboard shows system health, certificate status, and configuration warnings.
Multi-user support: Create and manage multiple email accounts and aliases through the admin panel.
Greylisting: Reduce spam with greylisting that temporarily rejects mail from unknown senders.
Mobile compatibility: Full support for IMAP/SMTP on mobile devices and desktop email clients.
